Producer: Brian Kavanaugh-Jones, Daniela Taplin Lundberg, Anita Gou, Chris Leggett, Alma Har'el
Production Co: Red Crown Productions, Automatik Entertainment, Kindred Spirit, Delirio Films, Harbor Picture Company
Synopsis: When 12-year-old Otis begins to find success as a television star, his abusive, alcoholic father returns and takes over as his guardian, and their contentious relationship is followed over a decade.
Title: Honey Boy
